# Eclipse specific files
.classpath
.project
.settings/
.metadata/

# Build artifacts
bin/
target/
*.class

# Web specific (for Dynamic Web Project)
WebContent/WEB-INF/lib/  # JARs in lib folder - IMPORTANT!

# Log files
*.log
logs/

# IDE specific files
.idea/ # IntelliJ IDEA files
*.iml  # IntelliJ IDEA module files
*.ipr
*.iws

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
